listings.title: Mountain Bike – Lightweight Frame, Smooth Ride
listings.briefDescription: Well-maintained mountain bike, great for city rides or trails.
listings.description: This mountain bike is in good condition and rides smoothly on both paved roads and light trails. The lightweight frame makes it easy to handle, while the reliable brakes and gears provide a comfortable and safe riding experience. Ideal for daily commuting, exercise, or weekend adventures. Recently checked and ready to ride.

listings.title: Comfortable Wooden Chair for Home or Office
listings.briefDescription: Sturdy wooden chair with a simple, modern design.
listings.description: A solid wooden chair that fits perfectly in a dining room, home office, or bedroom. The chair is stable, comfortable, and well-balanced, with minimal signs of use. Its clean design works with most interior styles, making it a practical and stylish addition to your space.

listings.title: Men’s Winter Jacket – Warm and Stylish
listings.briefDescription: Warm jacket in good condition, perfect for cold weather.
listings.description: This winter jacket provides excellent warmth while maintaining a clean and stylish look. It features a comfortable fit, durable zipper, and well-insulated lining to keep you warm on chilly days. Lightly worn and well cared for, making it a great choice for everyday winter use.

listings.title: Classic Blue Jeans – Comfortable Fit
listings.briefDescription: Casual blue jeans with a relaxed, comfortable feel.
listings.description: A pair of classic blue jeans suitable for everyday wear. The denim is durable yet comfortable, offering a relaxed fit without feeling loose. These jeans have been lightly worn and are still in great condition, perfect for casual outings or daily use.

listings.title: Flat Screen TV – Clear Picture & Great Sound
listings.briefDescription: Well-functioning TV with clear display and sound.
listings.description: This flat screen TV delivers a sharp picture and clear audio, making it perfect for movies, shows, and gaming. It has been well maintained and works perfectly with no issues. Ideal for a living room, bedroom, or office setup. Ready for immediate use.

listings.title: Casual Sneakers – Clean and Comfortable
listings.briefDescription: Comfortable sneakers, ideal for daily wear.
listings.description: These casual sneakers are lightweight, comfortable, and easy to wear throughout the day. They provide good support for walking and everyday activities. The shoes are in good condition with normal signs of use and are a great option for anyone looking for reliable daily footwear.
